header.subtitle: Exploration stories of the Moon, Mars, and beyond, landing bi-weekly in your podcast feed.

patreon.title: Support WeMartians
patreon.description: WeMartians is an ad-free, listener-funded podcast that depends on the generous support of its patreon subscribers. Join today for as little as $3/month and get access to many perks, including:
benefits: Access to the exclusive Off-Nominal Discord Community
Red Planet Review, the short weekly podcast covering Mars and space headlines
Advanced notice of interviews and a chance to contribute questions

mailingList.title: Get Updates
mailingList.description: Get just enough updates on podcasts, products, and news without cluttering your inbox.

mailchimpForm.label: Subscribe to the WeMartians Mailing List

shop.title: Get Space Merch
shop.description: Get WeMartians-branded and other space merchandise at our shop.
